text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item title:
GiftBay Wedding Metal Charger Plates 13" Round with Beautiful Fleur-de-lis Embossed on Border, Burgundy Finish, Set of 4 Plates, Made of Heavy Metal Sheet and Powder Coated

Item specifications:
Awesome metal charger plates with embossed Fleur-de-lis design, comes in a set of 4, burgundy finish
Excellent value, why buy cheap plastic made, when available direct from factory at an excellent price
Measures 13" diameter and fits in regular dinner plates
Cannot be used as dinner plates themselves
Additional quantity is available if needed for immediate shipment until is sold out
Powder Coated finish to last for long time for professional wedding and special events planners
Charger Plates also available in different designs and colors

Product description:
text.Response A: If you're looking for something that's both elegant and durable, then these GiftBay Metal Charger Plates are the perfect choice. Made of heavy metal sheet and powder coated with a beautiful burgundy finish, these charger plates will add a touch of class to any tabletop. The embossed Fleur-de-lis design adds a touch of elegance to the plates that will make them a hit at your next event. With a diameter of 13", these plates are big enough to fit dinner plates of almost any size. They are not meant to be used as dinner plates themselves, but rather as chargers to add a touch of style to your table setting. If you need a larger quantity, just let us know and we will do our best to get additional plates to you as soon as possible.
text.Response B: GiftBay Wedding Charger Plates 13" Round with Beautiful Fleur-de-lis Embossed on Border, Burgundy Finish, Set of 4 Plates, Made of Heavy Metal Sheet and Powder Coated. This is a set of 4 metal charger plates with embossed Fleur-de-lis design. They come in burgundy finish. These cannot be used as dinner plates themselves. They are made of heavy metal sheet and powder coated to last for a long time. They measure 13" in diameter and fits in regular dinner plates. Additional quantity is available if needed for immediate shipment until is sold out. Excellent value, why buy cheap plastic made, when available direct from factory at an excellent price. Charger Plates also available in different designs and colors.

meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
